case_circumstances: A decomposed, fully clothed remains found in woods, approximately 1/2 mile from road. The body was found on his back on the ground with both hands tucked in his coverall pockets, left leg crossed over the right, and a ski mask over his face.  No identification was found in clothing.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body:
Ski mask - brown
Work suit - one piece coveralls - green - (Blizzard Proof Insulated Outerwear, Wald Industry Inc, Pleurb TX USA)
Under the coveralls - blue jeans, white t-shirt, white underwear, green socks
case_footwear: Ankle high, lace-up work boots size 11  (see attached image).
case_jewelry:
Watch - silver colored Timex (automatic water resistant) with calendar and self winding -  on left wrist
Ring - turquoise and coral, left hand, third finger
Ring - eagle shaped with large turqoise stone, right hand, middle finger
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
